data.text: @MaxCrosse Kia ora Max, please check with your chosen testing center.
@hazardous_waist @covid19nz @minhealthnz I'm in a self imposed lockdown. Don't wait for anyone else. They are letting it rip. A lot of people will be RIP in the process.
@covid19nz Some people have no one to support them. So people with covid will be going out and spreading it based on this advice.
@covid19nz I really hate that if I have COVID SYMPTOMS i have GO OUT to get tests. WTF
@Melissa__Gould @covid19nz Call ahead though, none of the collection sites in Porirua have tests and have no idea why they’re listed as collection sites

@covid19nz Just been to collection sites in Porirua with my order number, none I’ve tried have tests and don’t know why they’re listed as collection pointsz, the last one I tried said there are no sites in Porirua that actually have tests
@Melissa__Gould @covid19nz There are a few RAT collection centers in Auckland. The closest one to East Auckland is Fair Mall in Otara.
@covid19nz Do you have to queue alongside people going for a PCR test, or is there a separate line?
@MXRecordNZ Kia ora, thanks for letting us know. We will pass this on to the @minhealthnz team.
@covid19nz Ordered online, no centres in East Auckland...
